articles.description: Manchester City's tame Champions League surrender to Real Madrid marks the end of an era, says BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty.

articles.title: Kylian Mbappe: Real Madrid striker wants to 'write history' after hat-trick past Manchester City

articles.description: Czech skier Tereza Nova is woken from an induced coma four weeks after undergoing brain surgery to treat injuries she sustained in a heavy fall during a training run.
articles.title: Czech skier Tereza Nova awoken from induced coma four weeks after fall
